skill.name: alphafold-database
skill.description: Access AlphaFold's 200M+ AI-predicted protein structures. Retrieve structures by UniProt ID, download PDB/mmCIF files, analyze confidence metrics (pLDDT, PAE), for drug discovery and structural biology.
skill.summary: Access AlphaFold's 200M+ AI-predicted protein structures. Retrieve structures by UniProt ID, downloa...
skill.author: K-Dense Inc.

security_audit.summary: No credential access, exfiltration patterns, or malicious execution flows were found. Network usage is limited to documented AlphaFold and related public APIs. Examples focus on data retrieval and analysis.

content.value_statement: Finding reliable protein structures is slow when data is spread across sources. This skill gives direct access to AlphaFold files and confidence metrics from known APIs.
actual_capabilities: Query AlphaFold prediction metadata by UniProt accession
Download mmCIF or PDB coordinate files by AlphaFold ID
Retrieve confidence and PAE JSON files for analysis
Access bulk datasets through Google Cloud Storage and BigQuery
Parse structures and extract pLDDT from B-factor fields
limitations: Requires internet access to AlphaFold and Google Cloud endpoints
Large bulk downloads can be slow and bandwidth intensive
Predictions are single-chain models and lack ligands or cofactors
AlphaFold IDs must be derived from valid UniProt accessions

use_cases.title: Inspect confidence quickly
use_cases.description: Fetch a protein prediction and review pLDDT and PAE to judge region reliability.

use_cases.title: Get docking targets
use_cases.description: Download target structures in PDB or mmCIF for docking and pocket analysis.

use_cases.title: Bulk proteome pulls
use_cases.description: Use GCS and BigQuery to collect many predictions for large scale analyses.

prompt_templates.title: Find by UniProt
prompt_templates.scenario: I have a UniProt accession and need the AlphaFold ID
prompt_templates.prompt: Get AlphaFold prediction metadata for UniProt P00520 and show the entryId and download URLs.

prompt_templates.title: Download structure
prompt_templates.scenario: I need the mmCIF and confidence JSON files
prompt_templates.prompt: Download the mmCIF and confidence JSON for AF-P00520-F1 and save them locally.

prompt_templates.title: Assess confidence
prompt_templates.scenario: I want pLDDT and PAE guidance
prompt_templates.prompt: Explain how to interpret pLDDT and PAE for AF-P00520-F1 and flag likely low confidence regions.

prompt_templates.title: Bulk dataset query
prompt_templates.scenario: I need high confidence human proteins
prompt_templates.prompt: Write a BigQuery query to list human proteins with fractionPlddtVeryHigh above 0.8.

output: Average pLDDT is high, with most residues above 90
Low confidence segments appear in flexible terminal regions
PAE suggests stable domain positions with a few uncertain interfaces

best_practices: Cache downloaded files locally to avoid repeated API calls
Always check pLDDT and PAE before drawing structural conclusions
Use BigQuery or GCS for large scale workflows
anti_patterns: Assuming all predicted regions are reliable without pLDDT review
Downloading full proteomes over REST instead of GCS
Ignoring AlphaFold version suffixes in file URLs

faq.question: Is this compatible with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code
faq.answer: Yes, it provides instructions and API patterns that work across Claude, Codex, and Claude Code workflows.

faq.question: What are the main limits of AlphaFold predictions
faq.answer: Models are single chain, may miss ligands, and low confidence regions should be treated as uncertain.

faq.question: How does it integrate with existing pipelines
faq.answer: It uses standard REST endpoints, BioPython parsing, and BigQuery queries that fit typical bioinformatics pipelines.

faq.question: Does it access or store my private data
faq.answer: No, it only uses public AlphaFold and Google Cloud datasets and does not request local credentials.

faq.question: What if the API returns 404 or 429
faq.answer: Check the UniProt ID, then retry with backoff and rate limits or use bulk datasets.

faq.question: How does this compare to direct website downloads
faq.answer: It enables automated retrieval, confidence analysis, and bulk access that the web interface does not provide.
